scripts.clean: rm -r static/* && mkdirp static/js && mkdirp static/css
scripts.build:css: sass scss/style.scss --sourcemap=auto static/css/style.css && postcss --use autoprefixer --autoprefixer.browsers 'last 5 versions' static/css/style.css -o static/css/style.css && cssmin static/css/style.css > static/css/style.min.css
scripts.build:js: browserify js/main.js --transform=babelify --extension=jsx --debug > static/js/build.js && uglifyjs static/js/build.js > static/js/build.min.js
scripts.build:prod: npm run update-autoprefixer && npm run clean && npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean && parallelshell 'npm run watch:css' 'npm run watch:js'
